name: Power Pumpkin Defense
description:
Devs:

Preston -  Art, Music

Alex - Programming

How To Play:

Place magical plants in the pots to protect your pumpkin from ghosts.

- Arrow keys to move

walk near the pots to place defense plants:

- Press E to place Punching Cactus

- Press F for Fire Flower

- Press R for Shrieking Root
